title: Shadows of Atlantis: Awakening
description: A NEW EDITION OF THIS BOOK HAS BEEN PUBLISHED ON 11/28/18. THIS ISBN HAS BEEN MOVED TO THE LATEST COVER. An epic paranormal fantasy of romance, seduction and betrayal in the royal courts of Atlantis. Shadow parasites invade the ancient crystal technology powering a civilization connected by the psychic emanations of its people. A reluctant hero must choose to accept his fate and stand with those who have begun to awaken to their ancient birthright.
author: Mara Powers
